title: Growth of national market economy - effect

content.prompt: Which of the following was NOT a result of the growth of a national market economy between 1815 and 1860 ?

choices.label: The application of machinery to the mass production of goods
A greater disparity of wealth between rich and poor Americans
The beginnings of an organized labor movement
A greater number of men working at home

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
